Reviews.Title: “Good value for the price”

Reviews.Content: flew indianapolis day stay friend recommended hotel stayed la quinta decided price reasonable worth try found comfortable clean staff friendly hotel highway hear traffic price paid im complaining fridge microwave definite plus breakfast simple trick free wifi appreciated hotel kept commenting paying times pay breakfast wifi recommend hotel chain looking nofrills value hotel
